pkgmetadata.longdescription: Godot is a IDE for building video games capable of making 3D and 2D games in a day. For scripting, it supports a python like scripting language called GDScript. It also supports C/C++, C# 7.0, visual programming. It has a built in 3D level editor, object manager,
